Topic.Title: Is there a way to search by name of game?

Posts.EditableText: For example, I would like to search for Zork 1.  Is there a way? The list of games here is huge!
Posts.HTML: For example, I would like to search for Zork 1. Is there a way? The list of games here is huge!

Posts.EditableText: You can search in the search box at the bottom of the site. Forum posts will be searched with games, though.
Posts.HTML: You can search in the search box at the bottom of the site. Forum posts will be searched with games, though.

Posts.EditableText:
You can also use Google directly using:
```
site:https://textadventures.co.uk/ "zork"
```
